snippet.title: This Bed We Made - Official First Trailer
snippet.description:
Enjoy the first official full trailer for This Bed We Made, the upcoming narrative adventure game that puts you in the middle of a murder mystery as Sophie, a nosy hotel maid in the 1950s. A playable demo is now available on Steam if you'd like to try it out.  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1243850/This_Bed_We_Made/

#IGN #Gaming
